item.title: How to Turning Fractional Leadership Into Full Teamship
item.description: Fractional leadership only works when it operates as one system, not a collection of experts.

item.title: Halfway Through Her TED Talk, This Neuroscientist Blanked Out. What She Did Next Was Perfect
item.description: On stage in front of 800 people, Anne-Laure Le Cunff realized her worst public speaking fear. But she rose to the occasion, and taught a major lesson ...

item.title: FedEx’s Use of AI Chatbots Is the Worst Thing a Company Could Do to Its Customers
item.description: Forcing your customers to interact with AI might seem like a good idea, but no one wants this.

item.title: Most Small Businesses Are Using AI for Ads. What’s Working, According to a Google Exec
item.description: Selin Song, Google’s president of customer solutions, shares how small businesses are using AI to level up and unlock new revenue streams.

item.title: A Focused Elon Musk Just Helped Tesla Secure a Record Quarter
item.description: Tesla now sits on a record $41 billion cash pile.
